name: trajectoryintersection
title: Intersect Trajectories with a polygon
description: Check if a trajectory interesect a given polygon and optionally returns the trajectory segments that intersects the given polygon

inputs.name: input_table_polygon
inputs.title: Polygon table
inputs.description: Table containing the polygon to intersect

inputs.name: polygon_properties_col
inputs.title: Polygon properties
inputs.description: Column with the polygon properties as a JSON-encoded string

inputs.name: return_polygon_properties
inputs.title: Return polygon properties
inputs.description: Select if the component should also return the polygon properties

inputs.name: intersection_method
inputs.title: Intersection method
inputs.description: Select if the component should also return the polygon properties

outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The table with the simplified trajectories
